title: Comparative Analysis and Application Simulation of Higher Education Institutional Cultures

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Decision-making training based on real higher education institutional culture cases, utilizing mobile-optimized VR simulations.

learning_goals: Participants can analyze the four types of organizational culture in higher education institutions (clan, adhocracy, hierarchy, and market) by applying them to real-world cases.
Participants can compare differences in organizational culture between public and private higher education institutions and propose strategic improvement directions.
Participants can implement conflict management and communication strategies based on organizational culture types in a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
